name: Used Oil LCA
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages for the Used Oil LCA Tool
This site hosts the development version of the Used Oil Lifecycle Assessment web application and wiki.

The tool was developed at the University of California, Santa Barbara (UCSB), under contract with the California Department of Resources Recycling and Recovery (CalRecycle).

Â©2015 California Department of Resources Recycling and Recovery (CalRecycle). All rights reserved.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
